Package qcar.g4

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Collision
    This class represents a collision between two QCars
    Decision
    This class represent a decision taken by a Driver
    DistanceSensor
    this class represent a Distance sensor from one driven QCar this is a straight line from the middle of the side to the first thing it intersects passing by the middle of side 2
    Driver
    this class represent the Driver of a QCar, it takes decision and uses a PlayerChannel to communicate with the world manager
    Driver.MyDecision
    Decision generator with hardcoded ones
    Factory
    This class generate different elements needed for the game.
    GameDescription  
    GameProvider  
    ManualDriver
    This class act as driver but for the qcar manually controlled by the IHM
    PlayerChannel
    This class serve as a communication channel between the driver thread and the world manager.
    QCar  
    QCarNature
    Describes the nature of each QCar
    SeenVertex
    Represents a seen vertex.
    Sensors
    Describes what a QCar can see around him
    WorldManager
    This class manage the state of the game and control any change to the world
    WorldManagerPhysicsHelper  
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    GameDescription.GameStyles
    Enumeration of the styles of games available The first QCars are always those being driven MIXED_WITH_BORDERS, game with mixed driven, static and parking QCars and the last QCar is a static QCar representing the border ONLY_DRIVERS_WITH_BORDERS, game with only driven QCars and the last QCar is a static QCar representing the border NO_STATICS_WITH_BORDERS, game with only driven and parking QCars and the last QCar is a static QCar representing the border NO_PARKINGS_WITH_BORDERS, game with only driven and static QCars and the last QCar is a static QCar representing the border MIXED_WITHOUT_BORDERS, game with mixed driven, static and parking QCars ONLY_DRIVERS_WITHOUT_BORDERS, game with only driven QCars NO_STATICS_WITHOUT_BORDERS, game with only driven and parking QCars NO_PARKINGS_WITHOUT_BORDERS, game with only driven and static QCars
